title: Citi: 95 Years of Excellence in Puerto Rico
summary: Puerto Rico - With a cocktail reception at the Ritz-Carlton Hotel & Casino in Isla Verde on August 28, Citi marked 95 years at the forefront of excellence in financial services in Puerto Rico. More than 200 clients attended, along with special guests and public sector officials, with Citi Puerto Rico Country Officer Guillermo Gómez presiding.
tag-1: Citi: 95 Years of Excellence in Puerto Rico
tag-3: Puerto Rico – With a cocktail reception at the Ritz-Carlton Hotel & Casino in Isla Verde on August 28, Citi marked 95 years at the forefront of excellence in financial services in Puerto Rico. More than 200 clients attended, along with special guests and public sector officials, with Citi Puerto Rico Country Officer Guillermo Gómez presiding.
tag-4: "We have a responsibility to Puerto Rico," said Francisco Aristeguieta, Citi Latin America CEO. "We will be here for a long time to come, because we know that this is a long-term business; we believe in emerging markets, and we remain committed to them. We have extensive knowledge of the local market because our clients have a deep understanding of the local economy. We know which issues are most important to our clients; we understand their reality, their concerns and their potential needs, and we adapt our global solutions to local needs."
tag-5: "Citi has a long commitment to Puerto Rico, where we have operated since 1918," remarked Guillermo Gómez, Citi Puerto Rico Country Officer. "It has been an honor for us over these 95 years to support this society's development by always offering our best service to all of our clients exclusively. Through our three branches in Puerto Rico, Citi collaborates with economic growth and development, drawing on our global network and experience to build a better future for our clients and the communities where we operate."
tag-6: Citi was founded in 1812 as a trade finance bank to facilitate trade between New York and Liverpool. Since then, the company has grown to become a leading brand in global financial services, serving 200 million clients in more than 100 countries, 24 of them in Latin America. Operating at the center of global trade and capital flows, Citi has facilitated some of the world's most transformative projects, including the Transatlantic Cable and the Panama Canal. With an unparalleled presence in emerging markets, the company is committed to collaborating in progress and economic growth.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
